emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Schenley High School graduates, from left, first row: Marjorie Jackson, Sara Blakey, and Mildred Taylor; second row: Mary Lewis, Lovell Golden, Portia Anderson, Margaret Strothers, Charles Moore, Virginia Meeks, Patricia White, and Raymond Brown; third row: Sidney Johnson, Blair McNeal, Julius Hart, and Brian Robinson, posed in Centre Avenue YMCA, another version
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 19, 1958, pg. 11 reads: "Schenley June Grads - Always known for their progressive programs and for sponsoring smart affairs, this year's Schenley June grads upheld this reputation last Friday night at the Centre Ave. YMCA, when they gave a dance that was "real down." Time out was taken from the "klatch" to pose for this picture.  First row, left to right: Marjorie Jackson, Sara Blakey, president, and Mildred Taylor.  Second row: Mary Lewis, treasurer; Lovell Golden, Portia Anderson, Council representative; Margaret Strothers, Charles Moore, Virginia Meeks, Patricia White and Raymond Brown.  Third row: Sidney Johnson, Blair McNeal, Julius Hart and Brian Robinson. - Harris Photo."
